review: It's a good device for the most part and the voice works as advertised, but only within the confines of Amazon which is very limiting. I have Hulu and Netflix accounts, but the voice search won't look on those sites for a show. As an example I set up the device, added all the connections for Netflix and Hulu, then did a voice search for Arrow and the only result was the Amazon On-Demand season DVD that I would have to purchase to watch, even though HULU has the curent season paid for and Netflix had the older seasons already paid for.  So that and it would only show in a 720 frame on my 1080p monitor, even though my computer will fill the screen nicely. I believe that has something to do with it being compatable with 1080i not 1080p. I am a computer tech and did try to change the display settings but the device would not budge off of auto select. I returned the device since it didn't fit my needs.
